response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price slightly above its cost to me but significantly below its market value. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to collaborate on this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 9500}
